name: Tacoma
tagline: NodeSchool chapter serving the Tacoma, Washington  Area
body: ### Upcoming Events are announced at [meetup.com/Tacoma-JS/](http://www.meetup.com/Tacoma-JS/) -------- ### Welcome Learn JavaScript & Node.js through interactive workshops run by volunteers! We present, code and discuss solutions. NodeSchool events have been held around the world, and successfully introduce beginners to JavaScript, Node, and the command-line. We're excited to bring NodeSchool to Tacoma. The in-person events give you a chance to learn in a collaborative environment, & also to help beginners if you already have JS/Node experience. ``` $ mkdir node_workspace $ cd node_workspace $ mkdir my_great_project $ cd my_great_project ``` -------- ## Study Guides ### - [Nodejs-basics](http://teamtreehouse.com/library/nodejs-basics) at Teamtreehouse; residents sign up for free at Pierce County Library [Gateways](https://teamtreehouse.com/gateways/pierce_county_public_library/signup?). Residents must first get a free library card at [Pierce County Library](http://www.piercecountylibrary.org/). ### - NodeSchool workshoppers (self study problem sets):[ http://nodeschool.io/#workshoppers](http://nodeschool.io/#workshoppers) ### - Beginining.js [book](http://it-ebooks.info/book/5471/) at it-ebooks.info ### - [Slideshows](http://vividventures.biz/d/?q=javascript) from past presentations - Rest: by Randy K. [blog](https://rlkamradt.wordpress.com/) [code](https://github.com/rkamradt) http://www.slideshare.net/JoeDevlin2/meetup-js-032815 ---------- ## Event Host Knights of Columbus Tacoma Council [809](http://kofc809.org/)
